snippet: A 21-month-old girl is the first person in Michigan to die from the virus that has caused severe respiratory illness across the country, state health officials said Saturday....

headline.print_headline: Michigan Toddler Dies From Enterovirus D68
headline.main: Michigan Toddler Dies From Enterovirus D68

lead_paragraph: A 21-month-old girl is the first person in Michigan to die from the virus that has caused severe respiratory illness across the country, state health officials said Saturday.
